thread.title: Man City boss Manuel Pellegrini says he is not punishing Vincent Kompany - Knutsford Guardian
thread.title_full: Man City boss Manuel Pellegrini says he is not punishing Vincent Kompany - Knutsford Guardian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Knutsford Guardian
title: Man City boss Manuel Pellegrini says he is not punishing Vincent Kompany - Knutsford Guardian
text:
Kompany has been on the bench for both City games since Pellegrini expressed frustration that the defender played for his country in a Euro 2016 qualifier last week. The 29-year-old had missed City's previous five games with a calf injury and Pellegrini had insisted he would not be fit to play during the international break.
 Knutsford Guardian.
